core: Developed high-throughput microfluidic system for cell aging studies

research_scientist.medium: Created microfluidic platform for aging studies
research_scientist.detailed: Designed and implemented microfluidic system for studying cellular aging, incorporating automated analysis and high-throughput processing

technical_ic.medium: Developed automated cell morphology analysis platform
technical_ic.detailed: Engineered comprehensive system combining microfluidic device fabrication with automated cell analysis software

automation_engineer.detailed: Developed automated analysis software that increased experimental throughput by 10x for cell aging studies

project_lead.medium: Managed development of cell aging research tools
project_lead.detailed: Planned and executed multi-year project to build comprehensive tool for studying cell aging
